goodberry.name: Goodberry
goodberry.description: Creates magical berries that provide nourishment and minor healing
goodberry.special: Creates 2-10 berries based on level, each heals 1 HP

cure_poison.name: Cure Poison
cure_poison.description: Neutralizes poison in the target's system

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.description: The target's skin becomes tough and bark-like, providing natural armor

call_lightning.name: Call Lightning
call_lightning.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning from the sky (more powerful outdoors)

plant_growth.name: Plant Growth
plant_growth.description: Causes plants to grow rapidly and entangle enemies in the area
plant_growth.special: Area effect, Dexterity save to avoid entanglement

speak_with_animals.name: Speak with Animals
speak_with_animals.description: Allows communication with natural animals and beasts
speak_with_animals.special: Enables conversation with animal NPCs and creatures
